text:
Hi community,
I'm trying to replace the feature image of the blogs with a feature video. I don't know how to do this. I found an article talking about this but I don't understand how this works. Anyone have an example to view how it shows in the frontend?
Link of the article: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Share-Your-Work/How-to-add-Featured-Video-functionality-to-a-blog/m-p/270876>

hi Everyone, is there any reason why a template wont suddenly appear when creating a page? i created 1 for our events listing but for some reason, it's suddenly not being included in the list of templates. it still works on the pages i have used it before and it still appears inside the design manager but only when I try to create page it's not showing up
